wines.productName: Heron Hill Dancing Bear Sparkling Rose 2023
wines.description: This Finger Lakes sparkling rosé showcases New York's ability to produce quality bubbles with fresh fruit character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of strawberry, raspberry, citrus, and floral notes
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with lively bubbles, red berry flavors, and crisp acidity
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with persistent bubbles and fruit

wines.productName: Lame Delisle Boucard Bourgueil Vieilles Vignes 2018
wines.description: This old-vine Bourgueil from the Loire showcases Cabernet Franc with concentration and Loire terroir.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of red cherry, raspberry, bell pepper, graphite, and violet
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with structured tannins, red fruit, herbal notes, and mineral character
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with fruit, herb, and mineral notes

wines.description: This powerful Toro red showcases Spain's Tinta de Toro with concentration and structure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark berries, earth, leather, spice, and oak
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, concentrated dark fruit, and powerful structure
tastingNotes.finish: Long, structured finish with persistent fruit and tannins

wines.description: This California Cabernet offers classic varietal character with structure and dark fruit concentration.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackcurrant, black cherry, cedar, tobacco, and vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, concentrated dark fruit, and oak spice
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and structured tannins

wines.description: This Ukrainian wine from Shabo showcases indigenous varieties with distinctive regional character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark fruit, spice, earth, and regional character
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins, dark fruit, and unique profile
tastingNotes.finish: Moderately long finish with fruit and earthy notes

wines.description: This Paso Robles Zinfandel showcases California's signature variety with ripe fruit and spice.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackberry, boysenberry, black pepper, vanilla, and spice
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with ripe dark fruit, spice, and smooth tannins
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and warming spice

wines.productName: Alfaro Family Vineyards Trout Gulch Chardonnay 2023
wines.description: This Santa Cruz Mountains Chardonnay from Trout Gulch Vineyard showcases cool-climate elegance with minerality.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, green apple, white flowers, and mineral notes
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity, citrus fruit, subtle oak, and pronounced minerality
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, mineral-driven finish with persistent citrus

wineDetails.region: Santa Cruz Mountains, California (Trout Gulch Vineyard)

wines.description: This artisanal blend from Trespass showcases creative winemaking with distinctive character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark fruit, spice, earth, and complex layers
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with structured tannins, concentrated fruit, and unique character

wines.description: This Abruzzo Montepulciano offers fresh fruit with soft tannins in an approachable style.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark cherry, plum, violet, and herbs
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with soft tannins, dark fruit, and smooth texture

wines.description: This Rioja Reserva from Monte Real showcases traditional extended aging with elegant development.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of red cherry, leather, tobacco, cedar, vanilla, and spice
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with silky tannins, evolved fruit, and balanced oak integration
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with aged character
